name: @quantcdn/quant-client
description: TypeScript client for QuantCDN and QuantCloud Platform APIs
author: QuantCDN

scripts.test:smoke: node -e "const api = require('./dist/index.js'); console.log('✓ SDK loads successfully'); console.log('✓ Exports:', Object.keys(api).length, 'items'); console.log('✓ Configuration available:', typeof api.Configuration); process.exit(0);"
scripts.test:all: npm run build && npm run test:smoke && npm run test:unit
